answers.answer: I'm wishing you tons and tons of labor dust as well!!!! Your almost there girl!

I am wishing you Labor Dust too!!! Yay!!I also wanted to add that if your swelling is abundant or seems abnormal.. You could definitely develop preeclampsia at any time so please get checked out if you think it is a real possibility. That canbe really dangerous!!!Otherwise, you are almost at the finish line, lady! I am so jealous.. I am 33 weeks.. Ugh.. 7 more to go for me.

question: So ladies i only have nine days until my dd!! Im so excited and soo happy...i really felt like i was never going to get here!! lol....I am to the point where most of you already know..where i feel like i just cant do this anymore but with the days coming to an end..i feel like i can relax!! FINALLY!! lol...Only now sence this is pretty welll my last week everything seems to be swelling!! MY face my feet my hands...haha hmm i wonder is it possible to develope preclampsia your last week!! THat would be weird sence i managed to stay away from it until now!! Wishing myself TONS AND TONS OF LABOUR DUST!! hehehe :)
title: Only 9  days to goo!! :)
